description.ko: 빛의 물리학을 시각적으로 탐구하며, 백색광이 유리 매질을 통해 매혹적인 스펙트럼으로 분산되는 찰나의 순간을 포착합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of the physics of light, capturing the precise moment white light splits into a mesmerizing spectrum through a glass medium.

prompt: A high-end cinematic macro shot of a triangular glass prism refracting a single beam of white light into a vibrant rainbow spectrum. Soft caustic light patterns on a minimal dark gray background, sharp focus, 8k resolution, realistic chromatic aberration, ethereal atmosphere, ray tracing.
